result.execSummary:
All charges against Derrick Yawsa Robinson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Derrick Yawsa Robinson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Derrick Yawsa Robinson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court for Derrick Yawsa Robinson.  Prosecuting attorney Claire E Zyber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz appeared by video for Derrick Yawsa Robinson.  Attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Final pre-trial held. Defendant not produced. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 09/21/2022 at 8:30 am in Branch 10.

Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.

*Defendant is in custody status. Court takes no further action at this time.

Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court, defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson not in court, in custody.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has a new case pending. Defense is requesting an adjourned final pretrial.  Case is adjourned to 9-16-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Violation Report 7-29-22

Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 8-2-22 at 8:30 amfor final pretrial and 9-21-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.
Defense is requesting justice point monitoring modification.  Bail review will be heard on 8-2-22 at 8:30 am along with the final pretrial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Attorney Rebholz was just appointed to this case and is requesting a status conference.  Defense needs discovery and an offer.  Case is adjourned to 7-14-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with SSK (DOB 9/3/87)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Derrick Yawsa Robinson in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Derrick Yawsa Robinson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
